alert.note: Alert for Southern Cayuga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 28 at 12:23PM EST until November 29 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph will create areas of blowing snow this afternoon into tonight. * WHERE...Southern Cayuga county. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest snow totals are expected to be from near Auburn north and east.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
